message:
SYSTEM: Wiki: sesión técnica "Patentes: lo que todo doctorando debe saber" 14-Feb-2012

Terminologies
- Intellectual Property
- Industrial Property
- Copyright
- Secreto Industrial / Know-How
Example of publishing a part PhD thesis as a patent
- PhD thesis : Creating a certain micro-organism
- Possible Patent : The optimal environment for the created micro-organism
Role of patent
- Electromechanical : historical role
- Pharmeutical : ingredients
- Biotechnology : tool of survival
- Electronic : bargaining chips
- University : royalty fee
- Individual : lottery tickets
Requirement for patenting
- Technical character
- Novelty
- Innovation activity
- Clarity
- Proof
What to avoid
- Abstract / poster
- deposit of thesis
- public access (internet article, paper)
Tools
- EspaceNet
- PatentScope
- Invenes
- Google Patent
- FreePatentOnline
- SurfIP
- PatentLents
Professional Service Fees of OEPM
- Search : 18-85 EUR
- Watch : 38EUR + Search Fee
- Technical Information of Patent : 440EUR
Software Patent
- US : possible
- EU : not possible. Note: Most of the applications don't have : tecnhical character and innovation
Misc
- Patent trolls is not allowed in Spain.
- Difference between "discovery" and "invention" : possible application in industry
- UPM Actua. Submit your idea to a competition here :
http://www.upm.es/portal/site/institucional/menuitem.e29ff8272ddfb41943a75910dffb46a8/?vgnextoid=24a0f3032e93f110VgnVCM10000009c7648aRCRD
speaker: SYSTEM
